mapper.select: SELECT DRW_NO, DT, NO1,NO2,NO3,NO4,NO5,NO6,NO7 FROM WHERE DRW_NO = #{drwNo}
SELECT DRW_NO, DT, NO1,NO2,NO3,NO4,NO5,NO6,NO7 FROM ORDER BY DRW_NO DESC
SELECT BALL_NO, cnt1, cnt2, cnt3, cnt4, cnt5, cnt6 FROM ball_no_tb
mapper.update: UPDATE ball_no_tb A ,(SELECT NO1 NO,COUNT(1) CNT FROM win_no_tb GROUP BY NO1 ) B1 ,(SELECT NO2 NO,COUNT(1) CNT FROM win_no_tb GROUP BY NO2 ) B2 ,(SELECT NO3 NO,COUNT(1) CNT FROM win_no_tb GROUP BY NO3 ) B3 ,(SELECT NO4 NO,COUNT(1) CNT FROM win_no_tb GROUP BY NO4 ) B4 ,(SELECT NO5 NO,COUNT(1) CNT FROM win_no_tb GROUP BY NO5 ) B5 ,(SELECT NO6 NO,COUNT(1) CNT FROM win_no_tb GROUP BY NO6 ) B6 SET CNT1 = B1.CNT, CNT2 = B2.CNT, CNT3 = B3.CNT, CNT4 = B4.CNT, CNT5 = B5.CNT, CNT6 = B6.CNT WHERE A.BALL_NO = B1.NO AND A.BALL_NO = B2.NO AND A.BALL_NO = B3.NO AND A.BALL_NO = B4.NO AND A.BALL_NO = B5.NO AND A.BALL_NO = B6.NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ( DRW_NO, DT, no1, no2, no3, no4, no5, no6, no7 ) values ( #{drwNo}, #{dt}, #{no1}, #{no2}, #{no3}, #{no4}, #{no5}, #{no6}, #{no7} )
